dc:title: To Make Love Loved
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appeal for funds. Lauds begging and says what is given is given to Christ who is sometimes hard to see in the destitute. Says all are poor in some way.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 912 1952-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
